titles.title: A bill for the relief of Alfredo Plascencia Lopez and Maria Del Refugio Plascencia.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3002-3003)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
3/12/2007--Introduced.
Provides for the relief of Alfredo Plascencia Lopez and Maria Del Refugio Plascencia.
